string.value: Lady Syl has something she wants to propose to you.

Lady Syl proposes that you develop your skills. She tells you to visit Suri the Owl, who is located at The Secret Garden Basement. She says that although the owl can communicate with humans only by using vocabulary cards, he is an expert at training Dual Blades. Training through an owl...?

Lady Syl proposed that you develop your skill. She told you to visit Suri the Owl located at the Secret Garden Basement. She said that although the owl can communicate with humans only by using vocabulary cards, he is an expert at training Dual Blades. You met the owl, who seems normal, whatever that means...

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Talk to #bSuri#k located at The Secret Garden Basement.
Now that you've taken your first step as a Dual Blade, why don't you develop your skills?

Down in The Secret Garden Basement, you'll find my pet owl, #bSuri#k. Although he can't talk, he can communicate by using cards with vocabulary words. He is an excellent training instructor, so please visit him to develop your skills.
I suppose you can train on your own, but that's usually very difficult for most...

Down in The Secret Garden Basement, you'll find my pet owl, #bSuri#k. Although he can't talk, he can communicate by using cards with vocabulary words. He is an excellent training instructor, so please visit him to develop your skills.
